subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Varejao, Cleveland’s starting center, tore his left Achilles’ tendon in a win over the Timberwolves on Tuesday, an injury that will probably end his season.
snippet: Varejao, Cleveland’s starting center, tore his left Achilles’ tendon in a win over the Timberwolves on Tuesday, an injury that will probably end his season.
